result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on December 22, 2022 at 10:20 am.

9:51 AM. Defendant Sheldon Clay Moore appeared by video.  Attorney Jevon Jones Jaconi appeared by video for Sheldon Clay Moore.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Jaconi indicates possible resolution, requests another date.  Bond remains in effect.

9:51 AM . Defendant Sheldon Clay Moore appeared by video.  Attorney Jevon Jones Jaconi appeared by video for Sheldon Clay Moore.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin. Defense waives reading of Information and enters not guilty plea. Bond remains in effect.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 22, 2022 at 10:20 am.

9:51 AM . Defendant Sheldon Clay Moore appeared by video.  Attorney Jevon Jones Jaconi appeared by video for Sheldon Clay Moore.  Attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for State of Wisconsin. Defense waives right to Prelim. Court questions defendant on waiver. Court finds waiver made freely and voluntarily, accepts waiver and binds over for trial. Court finds probable cause for bindover.
Arraignment on October 6, 2022 at 09:50 am.
Waiver of Prelim on October 6, 2022 at 09:50 am.

11:14 AM Prosecuting attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Sheldon Clay Moore appeared by video. Counsel didn't appear.  Court reschedules.  Bond remains in effect.

11:14 AM Prosecuting attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Sheldon Clay Moore appeared by video. Counsel didn't appear.  Court reschedules.  Bond remains in effect.
Waiver of Prelim scheduled for October 6, 2022 at 09:50 am.
Arraignment scheduled for October 6, 2022 at 09:50 am.

Jaconi Request to reschedule
Search warrant, Affidavit, Return of Officer
Cash bond posted by Peter Moore.
Pretrial Release Monitoring Program: Must be enrolled and equipment activated prior to release. GPS Monitoring. No contact direct or indirect with M.A.M., her residence or place of employment.
Converted to cash bond.

1:02 PM Defendant Sheldon Clay Moore appeared by video from Door County Jail.  Attorney Jevon Jones Jaconi appeared by video for Sheldon Clay Moore.  Attorney Nicholas Paul Grode in court for State of Wisconsin. Court addresses request for bond modification. State requests signature bond be amended to cash bond.  Defense objects. Defendant makes statement. Court grants request, amends bond.
Motion to Modify Bond
Arraignment on August 9, 2022 at 11:10 am.
Waiver of Prelim on August 9, 2022 at 11:10 am.

3:20 PM Defendant Sheldon Clay Moore appeared by video from Kewaunee County Jail.  Attorney Jevon Jones Jaconi appeared by video for Sheldon Clay Moore.  Attorney Nicholas Paul Grode in court for State of Wisconsin. Court questions where matter is at.  Atty Jaconi requests waiver of prelim and arraignment be scheduled. Bond remains in effect.
Waiver of Prelim scheduled for August 9, 2022 at 11:10 am.
Arraignment scheduled for August 9, 2022 at 11:10 am.

2:30 PM Prosecuting attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Sheldon Clay Moore in court.  Attorney Jevon Jones Jaconi appeared by video for Sheldon Clay Moore. Court reviews events in file, questions where matter is at. Defendant indicates has made payments to ADL for monitoring.  Court inquires defense on prelim. Atty Jaconi indicates will advise at next court date if requesting a prelim.  Bond remains in effect.

1:01 PM Prosecuting attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Sheldon Clay Moore appeared by video.  Attorney Sarah  Malcore appeared by video for Sheldon Clay Moore. Court addresses bond modification request. State requests bond be amended from signature bond to cash bond. ADL Monitoring is requesting to remove GPS monitoring due to lack of payments. This is a violation of the bond. State requesting cash bond in lieu of GPS monitoring.  Defense indicates will be able to make payments.  Court denies request, bond remains as previously set.  Court indicates defendant is to makes $250 payment 4/1/22 and 4/15/22.
Status conference scheduled for April 18, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Bail/bond hearing on March 29, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Motion to Modify Bond
Attachments for Motion to Modify Bond.pdf
Status conference on May 23, 2022 at 03:20 pm.

10:36 AM  Defendant Sheldon Clay Moore appeared by video.  Attorney Heather Richmond appeared by video for Sheldon Clay Moore, Attorney Nicholas Paul Grode appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. Court inquires why defendant not in court. Defendant indicates at work.  Defense requests prelim, waives timelimits.  Court finds waiver is being made freely, voluntarily and intelligently, accepts waiver.  Bond remains in effect.
Status conference scheduled for May 23, 2022 at 03:20 pm.
Defendant fingerprinted on 1/7/22.
